attributes.action: Increase the amount of statuary sickness to allow people to survive.
attributes.additional_details: Increase the statuary sickness or implement a plan to offer a sustainable support to the population that will fall into poverty due to loss of work, or that will not perceive a salary during the pandemic.
attributes.background: 118£ a week are not enough for people to survive. During this pandemic many people are obliged to be off work and will fall into poverty. Provide the necessary help for people to survive.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302277

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
